article_metadata.author: Mike Patton

og.description: The Affordable Care Act (a.k.a. Obamacare) mandates that every U.S. citizen must: 1) purchase qualified health insurance, 2) obtain a qualified exemption, or 3) pay a penalty. You'll find the majority of the qualified exemptions in this article.
og.title: Obamacare Exemptions: How To Avoid A Penalty
